name: King Aemon al Caar al Thorin

chapters.title: Chapter 51: News Comes to Cairhien
chapters.info: King Aemon al Caar al Thorin, p. 861 (610)—King of Manetheren during the Trolloc Wars. He died trying to save his city, and the city died shortly thereafter. The site of this battle was called Aemon's Field, which is where the present-day city of Emond's Field is located. Aemon's last names still exist in Emond's Field: the al'Caars and the al'Thors still live there.
